Package org.nzdis.micro

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Agent
    This interface describes the contract for agent implementations on the OPAL micro-agent framework.
    Group
    Role representing a Group.
    Intent
    The interface Intent is basis for every micro-agent intent and used for the linking mechanism used to dispatch messages depending on their encapsulated intents.
    PassiveRole
    Interface for PassiveRole.
    Role
    Represents an abstract Role.
    SocialRole
    Interface for SocialRole.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAgent
    The Class AbstractAgent is the core implementation to the agent interface provided with the OPAL micro-agent framework.
    AbstractRole
    Represents a base role.
    AgentController
    Publicly available agent controlling mechanism.
    AgentLoader
    Represents a generic group-wise agent loader.
    AnonymousAgent
    The AnonymousAgent is the simplest agent implementation and passes received messages directly to its roles handleMessage() method (via AbstractAgent).
    AnonymousRole
    AnonymousRole is a passive role implementation for compatibility with OPAL.
    ClojureConnector
    ClojureConnector provides all means to access Clojure code from Java respectively manage agent registration in Clojure.
    ClojureScriptExecutor  
    Debug
    This class provides debug output facilities.
    DefaultCljSocialRole
    The DefaultCljSocialRole is a specialization of the DefaultSocialRole and assumes that message handling is done in Clojure.
    DefaultMessageFilter
    Default message filter implementation for micro-agent decomposition.
    DefaultPassiveRole
    Basis for Passive role implementation.
    DefaultSocialRole
    Basis for Social role implementation.
    Event
    Represents an abstract Event.
    Log
    Log class for use by developer.
    MessageFields
    All message fields for use with .toString functionality in MicroMessage.
    MessageFilter
    The MessageFilter is a specialization of the social role provides the basis to define own message filters in order to allow effective decomposition of micro-agents by means of message filters.
    MicroMessage
    MicroMessage represents a wrapper around the hashmap used as data container for the actual communication.
    MTConnector
    The MTConnector (or MessageTransportConnector) links the agent implementation with the message passing framework sending side.
    NullEvent
    Predefined NullEvent.
    NullIntent
    Predefined NullIntent.
    PlatformController  
    SimpleEvent  
    SystemAgentLoader
    Default System-wide AgentLoader.
    SystemOwner
    Represents a system owner.
